description: Consumes log message from containers and writes them to Kafka

env.name: LOG_LEVEL
env.description: Set log level to output for plugin logs

env.name: KAFKA_BROKER_ADDR
env.description: Comma delimited list of broker addresses. E.g. broker1:9092,broker2:9092

env.name: LOG_TOPIC
env.description: Name of the topic to write docker logs to
